name: I <3 You (PC Only) (Day 2: A Game a Day)
name_original: I <3 You (PC Only) (Day 2: A Game a Day)
description:
I <3 You


I <3 You is a game about being in a relationship. Try to see how long you can last in one.  For some, it's very hard.

This is the 2nd game of my Game a Day challenge. I'll be making a game from scratch every single day until July 1st. To learn more about it, click this link. https://anxietymonstergames.wordpress.com/2018/06/01/a-game-a-day-blog/ 

Controls: 
Press Keyboard keys that appear on screen.

Credits: 
Music from freemusicarchive.org
Pixel Heart by Bottlesmoker

Mac version coming shortly
